code: import React,{useState}from'react';import RegisterForm from'../components/RegisterForm';import SignInForm from'../components/SignInForm';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthPage=()=>{const[isRegistering,setIsRegistering]=useState(true);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-container",children:isRegistering?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterForm,{onSwitchToLogin:()=>setIsRegistering(false)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignInForm,{onSwitchToRegister:()=>setIsRegistering(true)})});};export default AuthPage;
